titleInfo.title: Martha White Pet Milk Job No. 37528

mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 2067) for an order placed for Martha White Pet Milk by Joe Taylor for 500 two color window cards and 500 two color jumbos (half sheets) for a performance by Marty Robbins, Ernest Tubb, Bill Anderson, and Bobby Bare at the Cobo Arena on November 14. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
